job.title: Data Analyst
job.description:
Position: Data Analyst
Duration: 4 months
Location: New York, NY 10020 (Remote as of now, may go hybrid when office reopens)
Pay rate: $60/hr. on w2


Job description:
4+ years professional experience and comfort working with large data sets required.
Proficiency in Tableau, SQL, Microsoft Excel, and PowerPoint are required.
Experience with traditional TV and digital measurement ( Adobe highly preferred).
Bachelor's degree or equivalent in marketing, communications, economics, statistics or related field.
Attention to detail, accuracy, organization, strong problem-solving skills and exceptional work ethic are essential.
Able to communicate complex ideas, stories and datasets graphically as well as verbally.
Ability to collaborate and work closely with other parts of the business as well as external partners.
Capable of prioritizing multiple projects and ad-hoc requests while thriving in a fast-paced environment.
Self-starter, resourceful, flexible, proactive & a true team-player who is willing to pitch in wherever needed.
Passion for the entertainment industry and television programming.
